translation.en: Old Flo was one of my very favorite chimpanzees.

translation.en: She had this wonderful way of playing with her offspring.
translation.vi: Cô ấy chơi với con cái mình theo cách rất tuyệt.

translation.en: She would lie on her back, take the wrist of the infant,
translation.vi: Cô ấy sẽ nằm ngửa, nắm lấy cổ tay đứa trẻ,

translation.en: Old Flo died very peacefully, just crossing a stream.
